search.query: | inputlookup lookup_host_site.csv | stats count by SiteName

`xd_index` sourcetype="xendesktop:*:session" MachineName="$server$" SiteName="$SiteName$" UserName="$username$" StartTime!="" | eval UserName = lower(UserName) | rename MachineName AS host | join host UserName [search `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMK:ICASession" host="$server$" UserName!="_Server_Total" | stats count by host UserName Latency_-_Session_Average | fields host UserName Latency_-_Session_Average | eval UserName = lower(UserName)] | makemv delim=";" ApplicationsInUse | stats values(ClientName) as Device values(IPAddress) as "IP Address" values(ClientVersion) as "Client Version" values(ApplicationsInUse) as Applications mean(Latency_-_Session_Average) as ml BY host UserName StartTime | where ml >= $meanLatency$ | rename host AS Host UserName AS "User Name" ml AS "Mean Latency" StartTime AS "Log on Time"
